name: zds-editor
description: Markdown editor used on Zeste de Savoir

scripts.watch: watchify -t babelify index.js --standalone Editor -o 'exorcist -b dist/ dist/bundle.js.map > dist/bundle.js' -d
scripts.build: browserify -t babelify index.js --standalone Editor --debug | exorcist -b dist/ dist/bundle.js.map > dist/bundle.js
